hero.about: We are a team of skilled software engineers specialized in web applications and research and development projects.

content: Our company came directly from the academic environment.

Our engineers (including CEO and CTO) are working at the local university as teachers of Computer Science classes. We are partners in scientific conferences. We conduct internship programme for the most gifted students.
We believe that our close cooperation with the university helps us maintain the quality of our software.
Our engineers are highly experienced with the most modern tools for software development.

We are building progressive, scalable and solid web applications on top of Laravel framework. This allows us to fully focus on the client's business needs. For frontend and special cases we are using specialized tools for every specific task.

We run our projects using agile methodologies that allow us to deliver the best product in the expected time. The basis of our work is communication: between programmers, with the client and with the end users. We are transparent.

We care about the quality of our software. We use automated code quality tools to ensure that the development of new functionalities and updates are carried out quickly and efficiently. We are artisans.

company: Blumilk is a software house founded in Legnica, Poland in October 2020 by Piotr Nadybski and Krzysztof Rewak. They both worked together previously at a local university and on several IT projects.

Our developers and testers have gained their professional experience in corporations, software houses, freelance projects and creative agencies. We have worked for local and foreign clients. We have dealt with huge international projects, supporting a functioning business, promising startups and projects for the public sector.
We design, develop, deploy and maintain top-class, tailor-made software. We specialize in web technologies and research and development projects.
team: We have different experiences, we studied at different universities, we worked with different technologies. We are of different ages, with different views and different ideas about life. However, we all want to work in a stable environment, with ambitious projects and in a cool atmosphere.
Legnica and its region: this is where we come from or live. We want to build professionally the best software, away from the hustle and bustle of the city. We do what we like and we like what we do.

After work, we practice dozens of different hobbies: we ride bikes, hike in the mountains, play basketball, visit microbreweries, play board games, organize Jedi Academy tournaments and develop open source projects.

content: Our primary work tools are PHP and Laravel. We have many years of experience with many projects on various scales, so we know how to optimally use this framework for your goals. We use Behat, PHPUnit, ECS and Psalm. We can also work with Lumen and Phalcon.

GitHub is our primary workplace. We use it as a version control system, we handle code review there, and we run CI/CD there via GitHub Actions. All our projects are containerized with Docker according to the client's requirements.

We build the frontend using JavaScript and CSS libraries and frameworks: Vue.js, React, Svelte, Tailwind and others. We work with MySQL, PostgreSQL and other database management systems. We have experience with Redis, Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ.

references.lead: We want all our partners and customers to be 100% satisfied with us. Here are a few words about our projects.

wmd.quote: Blumilk developers helped me with a project in the education industry. A quite specific problem was solved by them in no time, and all the tasks were delivered perfectly. I will be happy to cooperate in more projects with them.

r&d.lead: We have experience in conducting research and development projects. Our engineers dealt with a cross-section of popular research issues, including big data processing, scheduling problems, the use of artificial intelligence or broadly understood optimization. Our team members also worked as R&D project coordinators, so we know exactly the processes and problems of such projects.

web.lead: We all come from the web development environment. We use the best tools to deliver the best software for the client and his users. We use our extensive experience to make our applications convenient to use on any device, fast, easily expandable and secure. Our team can explore the product domain to best accomplish the tasks set; regardless of whether it is the insurance, educational, administrative, financial or other industries.

business.lead: We fully understand that the software has to solve business problems: optimize tasks and resources, secure data, enable further scaling, and make life easier. Nowadays, most or practically all processes taking place in companies are often based on IT systems. We want to help make sure everything works as well as possible.

soda.lead: Software Development Association Poland (SoDA) is an organization aimed at developing cooperation between software companies. It is the oldest and the largest organization of IT Service Employers in Poland, which is a mine of contacts and knowledge helping to develop the activities of companies operating in our industry. Thus, we are among the hundred most important companies on the market with a profile similar to ours.

cwup.lead: As part of collaboration, we strive to cooperate in the improvement of study programs in the fields of Information Technology and Production and Logistics Engineering. In addition, we declare the possibility of carrying out practical classes (internships, projects), a constant willingness to accept students of selected fields of study for apprenticeships, and the possibility of cooperation in the development and implementation of educational projects.

lpm.lead: An active community of programmers from all over Poland who want to expand their knowledge about Laravel and PHP. With other companies, we create tech meetups, which are held regularly every two months, we present interesting topics and fund prizes.

career.lead: We are recruiting! Below you will find detailed job offers for the positions we intend to fill in the near future. We are also open to spontaneous applications.
career.excuse: At the moment, we do not have any open recruitment for any position. We are, however, opened to spontaneous applications.

description.1: We are looking for programmers with professional experience in the field of designing and developing web applications. Our core technology is PHP and Laravel, but we are open to intertechnological dialogue.

As part of cooperation with Witelon Collegium State University, we are looking for students who want to take internships designed for future software engineer. It is a great opportunity to get to know the work ethos of a software engineer, meet professionals and learn practical skills.
description.2: If you are studying at another university, we also encourage you to contact us.
description.3: We expect some knowledge of PHP programming, using the object-oriented paradigm in web applications, using Git and GitHub and being communicative and willing to learn new things and work in a team.

career.requirements-label: We require a certain level of craftsmanship from all our developers. Programming for fun is one thing, but working in a team for international clients in the latest technologies is something different. We would like you to:

requirements.docker: know how to use PHP in a dockerized environment
requirements.di: use dependency injection in your Laravel applications by default
requirements.testing: test your code (even before you write any LOC)
requirements.composer: know the difference between composer install and update
requirements.oop: have a good knowledge about object-oriented PHP
requirements.eloquent: know how to avoid n+1 selects problem in Eloquent
requirements.tools: use automated tools to improve our code quality
requirements.processes: join GitHub Flow, code reviews and CI/CD processes

career.stack-label: We understand that every engineer chooses his own tools, so we don't want to create any misunderstandings. We are crafting web applications in PHP and Laravel, and we are team-working in a specific set of tools so that everyone knows what's going on. So:

php.name: PHP
php.description: with the newest version if that's possible

laravel.name: Laravel framework
laravel.description: when it's the best option for development

testing.name: PHPUnit
testing.description: and Behat, Dusk or Cypress for testing

docker.name: Docker
docker.description: to keep everything in manageable containers

github.name: Github
github.description: for version control, code reviews and CI/CD

google.name: Google
google.description: for docs, emails, calendar and other stuff

privacy.lead: On our website, we use cookies to provide services at the highest level and use them specifically to your needs. Cookies are used for statistical purposes.

qa.question: Cookies - what is it?
qa.answer: Cookies are small files sent by the website you visit and saved on your end device (computer, laptop, smartphone).

qa.question: Why do we use cookies?
qa.answer: We use cookies for statistical purposes to get the number of users visiting our website. This data enables us to analyze and develop the website. We also use "Google Analytics" for this purpose. Importantly, "Google Analytics" only saves the IP address assigned to you on the day you visit this website, not your name or other identifying information. More details about "Google Analytics" you can find at https://policies.google.com/privacy and https://www.google.com/analytics/terms/.

qa.question: Do you have any questions?
